desc: Inspirtech Furniture creates unique one of a kind additions to your home, business, or office. Our custom woodwork consists of Live Edge Tables, Epoxy Tables, Floating Shelving, Custom Wood Furniture, and more!

layout.text: Inspirtech Furniture creates unique one of a kind additions to your home, business, or office. We handcraft each item carefully to deliver the finest work tailored just to you. From custom resturant tables, comercial confernce tables, family dining tables, kitchen tables, live edge tables, live edge floating shelves, and so many more items to fit your needs! All of our furniture is crafted in Pennsylvania and ships anywhere in the USA for free. Every product we create is crafted with hand picked lumber from all around the world, ensuring you get EXACTLY what you are looking for. Choose from domestic woods like Oak, Walnut, Pine, Ash, Cherry, maple, and more. Or match a unique style or theme in your home with exotic woods like Pakauk, Zebrawood, Ebony, Mahogany, Purple Heart, and more! Inspirtech strives for excellence and is comitted to provinding high quality, personalized service. We care about communication and focus on creating the best experience.
